Paddywagon Share Review Save At a glance Open until 2:00 AM See all hours 7940 Via Dellagio Way Ste 118, Orlando, FL 32819-5400 Website +1 407-420-7165 Email Improve this listing About Paddywagon Irish Pub is a neighborhood bar that prides itself on serving a good drink, at a fit price, in a clan inviting atmosphere. Whether booking a corporate outing, hosting a birthday party, or just grabbing a cold beer and playing our free steel tip darts, we've got something for everybody!
